entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is in trouble and needs help. He is described as slamming his fist on the table.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl and is mentioned as landing on Ron's chair. She is also described as clicking her beak expectantly for food.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having Hedwig land on the back of his chair.

relationships.description: Harry owns Hedwig, which is described in the text as 'his owl'.
Hedwig lands on Ron's chair, indicating that she has landed on him.
